name: DARK DEMOLITION CRASH RACE
description:
The most anticipated game of the year has finally arrived! DARK DEMOLITION CRASH RACE is a mad crash and bash racing game where you will race and drift to win! Destroy the other cars to increase your odds. You have to check your car’s status and try to avoid getting wrecked. Enjoy the long turns of the road and drift as long as you can!


Features:
-breakable cars
-special effects
-varied choosable cars
-fantastic physics
